title: One Bedroom Available! Wilshire/Grove Area! Id#7
neighborhood: 425 S Detroit St, Los Angeles, CA 90036
posting_body: Vintage style 1 bedroom apartment are available!
Located in one of the best areas of LA.
Walking distance to Trader Joes, LACMA, the Grove, La Tropezianne, Republique, Odys & Penelope, and more.
Plus, just a hop skip and a jump to Hollywood, Griffith Park, or DTLA.
You'll love this beautiful building, and the tree-lined street.
The apartment features exposed brick and generous closets.
There is a great view, large windows, with a lot of natural light during the day.
The newly, renovated kitchen is great for cooking and entertaining and contains top-of-the-line cabinetry, countertops, and custom flooring.
Newly renovated appliances included Ceiling fans, Large Windows/Natural Light!
AMENITIES: Fitness Center, Cinema Room, Pool Table, BBQ, and Fire Pit as well!
Details/Logistics:
Deposit: One month's rent
Pet Deposit: $200.00
One Time Pet Fee: $100.00
Application Fee: $40.00
Owner Paid Utilities: Gas
Tenant Paid Utilities: Electric, water, trash and sewage
Laundry Onsite
Street Parking
Parking Lots Nearby:
- District La Brea (181 South La Brea Ave)
- 5670 Wilshire Blvd.
- 5200 Wilshire Blvd.
* Square footage may not be exact.
Square footages are based on estimates from model units.
** Marketing pictures may not be of the actual unit.
Units do not come with furniture.
***Application, Admin, and security deposit fees subject to change
****$2.83 city SCEP fee added to monthly rent
